:::Airazor/Treadshot:::

::They had been battling for some time now, neither one conceding an 
inch the entire time, but both were tired.  Airazor was about ot fire 
again at Treadshot when all of a sudden she got struck by energon 
lightning!  Treadshot moved forward, expecting ot see the dead body 
of his opponent, but instead seeing a mechanical Falcon::
Airazor: Airazor, maximize!
::She transformed.  She looked herself over.  She had become a 
transmetal!  She was now a fiery orange color with claw guns on her 
hands.  Treadshot fell to the ground as Airazor fired 15 shots from 
each of her six semi automatic claw guns.  he got up::
Treadshot: Grr, you will pay for that, fembot!
::He punched her in the stomach and she fell down.  Treadshot kneeled 
down taking out his knife, about to stab throguh her spark when he 
felt her feet close around his neck, pressing in on either side.  
Realizing that he couldnt breathe, he tried to negotiate::
Treadshot: C-come on, b-baby, g-gimmme a break, will ya.
Airazor: Okay.
::She twisted her feet, with his neck still in it, to the side, thus 
giving him a break... in his neck!::
Airazor: Sorry if it wasnt what you had in mind!
::Treadshot's spark goes off line.  he is dead::

OOC: Please put Teadshot on the deceased list.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Airazor/Treadshot:::
> 
> ::Airazor looks around the battle field, looking for someone to 
battle.  She 
> catches Treadshots eye and he moved forward::
> Treadshot: You want a piece of me?
> Airazor: No.  I want the whole thing!
> Treadshot: In that case...
> ::Catgut transforms into his gun and he opened fire on Airazor::
